name: Platypus Hoser Reservoir
description: Uncomplicated design suits purists who want a light and simple reservoir. If you want to trick it out, a full range of Platypus accessories are available.HyFlow bite valve gives you even better flow rate compared to previous versions.Silver-ion embedded in the material protects clean water from mold and bacteria.Hanging loop to secure it in a backpack.Outlet accepts all threaded Platypus drink tubes and closure caps.All materials are certified food-grade, BPA-, BPS-, phthalate-free and taste-free, guaranteed.
